mapper.select: SELECT fUuid AS 'uuid', fCustomerChargeTypeUuid AS 'customerChargeTypeUuid', fOperationType AS 'operationType', fFirstChargePercentage AS 'firstChargePercentage', fSecondChargePercentage AS 'secondChargePercentage', fThirdChargePercentage AS 'thirdChargePercentage', fFourthChargePercentage AS 'fourthChargePercentage', fFifthChargePercentage AS 'fifthChargePercentage', fFirstPageChargePercentage AS 'firstPageChargePercentage', fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_customer_charge_type_percentage WHERE fCustomerChargeTypeUuid = #{customerChargeTypeUuid}
